CustomField.description: A unique, machine-readable name for this node (e.g., "step_1_find_account", "check_warranty_status"). This name is used by the 'Conditional Edges' of other nodes to route the process to this step. It must be unique within the same Parent Graph Capability.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a unique API-style name for this step (no spaces, use underscores). This is the 'address' of the node. Another node will refer to this name in its 'Conditional Edges' to continue the process here. Example: get_contact_details.
CustomField.label: Node Name
